amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to eliminate funding for DOE's Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Department of Energy's Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,960,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 277 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 277 (Roll no. 376).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
